name: Cyborg City: Overrun
description:
Cyborg City: Overrun is a game that is a work in progress developed by a group of 6 students at SUNY Polytechnic Institute for a class project.

The goal is to have a rogue-lite game that takes place in a city that was overrun by a cyborg mafia. The players goal is to rid the cyborg menace, however many tries it takes.

We are still early on in development but updates will be coming.
